quote_first: If he'd lived in New York and worked in an office, he might have thrived as the typical, over-martini'd, cheating husband, leaving every night on the
quote_last: to White Plains, a smudge of lipstick high on his neck, and a tide of lies to see him through to the next day.
title: The Life and Opinions of Maf the Dog, and of his friend Marilyn Monroe
author: Andrew O'Hagan
